attributes.action: review the tax on petrol, and help those of us who HAVE to travel for work
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am starting this petition in relation to the price of Feul in the UK. Recently this hit the £1 a litre barrier, and locally I am seeing prices of up to 114.9p which as a consumer, who travels upto 30,000 miles a year for work, is causing a major dent in my pocket. I regularly put 50 litres into my economical car (which will do around 460 miles with 50 litres) which over the past month has cost me on average an extra £40. Money which could be used to buy clothes for my children, or pay for the increased cost in my mortgage. The feul duties are hitting the average person extrmely hard which means we, as the people you represent are struggling to fulfill our financial obligations. Please help me and people like me who are finding by the day that the cost of living is becoming too high...
